name: Greek Word for Dodge
description:
An experimental game.

You are thrown into random worlds fighting off an oppressive force that have been invading planets and colonies for years. It's your job to take down as many enemies as you can before your inevitable demise!

There are minimal graphics setting in the directory where the .exe is extracted to. You will be looking for 'game.settings' and the rest should be self explanatory.

Because the credits never made it into the final upload and was instead lost to the ether, just like the proper boss bullet texture, here they are;

Zichqec - Lead Artist/Game Designer

Maxwell Balega (Pommy) - Lead Game Designer/Programmer/Modeler/Musician

Dylan (Unpractical) - Game Designer/Musician
